title: Average value of a trig function on an interval

content.question: What is the average value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <msqrt> <mrow> <mi>cos</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </msqrt> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F29@</annotation> </semantics> </math> on the interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mfrac> <mi>π</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4103@</annotation> </semantics> </math>?

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
